/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by towering buildings on either side. Cars and buses, tiny from this height, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene.

The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the urban hustle below. The image is taken from a low angle, which accentuates the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, painting a picture of a city that is both vibrant and tranquil.
